review_headline: Marginally compatible-avoid for now
review_body: Taste is ok, but pod compatibility is marginal at best. 25-50% of the pods failed to puncture and just ran water; many produced a dribble of coffee and then shut off after leaking much water into the drain. I tried machine cleaning, changing size settings, prepuncturing pods, and nothing produced consistent results. Avoid this company until they improve their design.

product_title: Minute Rice Whole Grain Brown Rice - 14 oz
review_headline: So-so generic brown instant rice, however the microwave instructions are completely wrong and VERY dangerous!
review_body: I would like to say that this review is more of a response to the horrible microwave instructions than of the product itself.    The product is passable as an instant brown rice.  Not much flavor, but it's passable if you need a quick side-dish or some filler ingredients for things likes soups.  But nothing to write home about.    However, I would like to address the huge issue- this is DANGEROUS to cook in the microwave!  The box (and website) proclaims that the cooking time in a microwave is seven minutes for 2 servings.  The instructions tell you to put the water and rice into a microwave-safe bowl and set the timer.    I did this once a few months ago, and at the five-minute mark I took the rice out and noticed that the water had completely evaporated and the rice was bizarre and overly crispy in terms of texture, and had even started to burn around the edges.  I decided to mark it up to me maybe not putting in enough water, and simply made some on the stove.    I tried it for a second time yesterday while visiting a friend, and this time it ended up almost setting his microwave on fire!  Three minutes in, I peeked in and noticed that the water seemed to be completely gone.  Weary but wanting to follow the instructions, I decided to let it cook another minute before checking it again.  When I returned about 60 seconds later, I found the microwave FULL of thick, billowing smoke.  Panicked, I opened the door and looked to see what was happening.  The rice had began to turn a dark, dark, burnt brown color (even become smoldering and black in spots) and was starting to burn up!  I can only imagine what would have happened if I let it go the full seven minutes!    Neither microwave is dysfunctional, and both are fairly weak microwaves.  (Usually we need to put things in a little longer, if anything.)  I have never, ever had this happen before with a product.  (I've cooked other rices in microwaves before when in a bind, although I prefer stove-top, and this never happens.)  And the fact it happened with two different microwaves (including one nice, big and expensive one and a smaller generic one) is just insane.    This is ludicrous.  Do they want us to set our houses on fire?

product_title: Traditional Medicinals  Tea
review_headline: It gave me terrible gas and I was sick for about 8 hours ...
review_body: I am not sure why, but this did not agree with me at all.  It gave me terrible gas and I was sick for about 8 hours after taking the tea.  I tried it twice with the same result, so will not be trying this again.  Looking for someone to pawn it off on.

product_title: RED DELICIOUS APPLES WASHINGTON STATE FRESH PRODUCE FRUIT 3 LB BAG
review_headline: ... season and somehow the holding of them is not good for they were touch and rotten inside
review_body: these apples are out of season and somehow the holding of them is not good for they were touch and rotten inside.  contacted seller and immediate apology and refund.  need these apples for gerd control.  hard to get this time of year.

product_title: Silk Soy Milk -- Chocolate, 8-Ounce (Pack of 24)
review_headline: Guys, listen to the People's Chemist and avoid soy
review_body: Shane Ellison, also known as the People's Chemist, gives you the no BS scientific approach to nutritional health.  Shane is an award winning chemist and drug designer.  He is the author of [[ASIN:1402225059 Over the Counter Natural Cures: Take Charge of Your Health in 30 Days with 10 Lifesaving Supplements for under $10]].  In that book he's telling the dirty secrets of the pharmaceutical companies.  Shane says, \\"My keen interest in nutrient logic helped me become an award-winning scientist and a medicinal chemist for one of the world's largest pharmaceutical companies. My studies and experience confirmed what I always knew: proper nutrient intake is the biggest determinant of overall health, longevity, and athletic performance. Nutrient logic has been saving lives throughout history.\\"  Nutrient logic states that humans can thrive with proper nutrients and will not thrive without these key nutrients.  Shane quit his career as a drug designer because he was disgusted with Big Pharma's willingness to ignore nutrient logic as a viable and inexpensive alternative to drugs.    Shane says, \\"A growing body of research revealed that soy protein contains plant estrogens such as genistein and daidzein, causing feminizing effects in the male body. A Harvard study published in the journal Human Reproduction also found a strong association between men's consumption of soy foods and decreased sperm counts. In total, studies show that soy increases inflammation, depletes the body of nutrients and disrupts thyroid function.\\"    Dr. Russell Blaylock is the author of [[ASIN:0929173252 Excitotoxins: The Taste That Kills]].  He states, \\"people who consumed the most soybean products had the greatest incidence of dementia and brain atrophy. These people are destroying their nervous system.... people ought to avoid soy products as if they were poison.\\"    Dr. Frank Lipman is an internationally recognized expert in the fields of Integrative and Functional Medicine.  His website has an article entitled, \\"Soy is Not a Health Food: 6 Things to Know About Soy's Big Downside.\\"  He states, \\"While soy may not kill you outright, soy's ability to undermine health is significant, and as a Wellness Practitioner I always advise my patients to remove it from their diets. Why? Because soy plays a role in the development of a number of debilitating conditions, which can morph into far larger problems down the line. For starters, soy disrupts thyroid and endocrine function. It interferes with leptin sensitivity, which can set you up for metabolic syndrome. Soy screws with your sex hormones by throwing off the estrogen and testosterone balance. It also helps block your body's ability to access key minerals like iron, zinc, calcium and magnesium. If that weren't enough, soy is a potentially lethal allergen to a segment of the population and an inflammation-triggering irritant to millions of people who may not even be aware that they're sensitive to it.\\"  He also states that \\"it's estimated that well over 95% of all soy is genetically modified. It's also known to be one of the most pesticide drenched crops on the market.\\"    Dr. Lipman also said, \\"Factory-farmed soy crops are amazingly destructive to just about everything they come in contact with, stripping the soil of nutrients, sickening the livestock who are fed it, inflaming the bodies of the people who eat it, and polluting the bodies of those who till the land. Who wants to contribute to that man-made mess?\\"  When I read that I felt a wave of sadness.    If you want more information see the books [[ASIN:0967089751 The Whole Soy Story: The Dark Side of America's Favorite Health Food]] and [[ASIN:1432717022 The Hidden Dangers of Soy]].

product_title: Hoosier Hill Farm Instant Clear Jel, 1.5 Lbs.
review_headline: Read this before you use Instant Clear Jel - avoid some disappointment.
review_body:
Don't believe the instant part of the name. Mix it in a food processor. Take your time to avoid lumps. Add it a teaspoon at a time an spread it around. It is every bit a much trouble to mix as the corn starch it replaces as a thickener. It does have some advantages over corn starch. It remains translucent. Corn starch turns kind of gray. It thickens some at room temperature or heated.

It doesn't resist acid as much as you would like. I took a pie (fresh peach I think) to a pot luck. The filling became a yucky goo by dessert time. I think it was because I had used lime juice to prevent discoloring. Maybe if I had used ascorbic acid instead of lime juice.

There are virtually no instructions supplied with the product. Just one paragraph on the label.

product_title: Sunflower Jasmine Tea 0.5 LB (227 g)
review_headline: Makes me sick
review_body: I like the flavor of this tea, but it makes me nauseous. At first I thought I was imagining it, but I switched to a different kind for a few days and the nausea went away. When I tried it again, I felt horrible again. My daughter came home this summer and noticed the same thing (without me mentioning my experience to her). Maybe we got a bad batch?

product_title: 40 Count - Flavored Coffee VUE Cups Variety Pack (GM Island Coconut, Folgers Caramel Drizzle, Van Houtte French Vanilla, GM Caramel Vanilla Cream, GM Hazelnut, GM French Vanilla, Folgers Vanilla Biscotti & Gloria Jean's Hazelnut)
review_headline: Horrible coffee, avoid purchasing this.
review_body: I rarely write reviews. The product must either exceed my expectations or fall dreadfully below my expectations. I have sampled every one of these on the lowest oz setting and they all taste the same. Honestly it tastes like old coffee with no difference between the bunch. Many of the cups came scuffed up, the flavor of coffee is barely there and the \\"variety\\" flavors are definitely not noticeable. I have tried a variety of the starbucks k-cups that were fantastic and the donut shop coffees were significantly better than these; I have even tried a few of the green mountain k cups and they tasted fine. The vue packs are supposed to offer a more robust and noticeable flavor, and I did not get that at all from these cups. I am really disappointed, and not satisfied at all with this purchase; I would advise everyone to stay away from this.

product_title: Raw Whole Macadamias (1 Pound Bag)
review_headline: Stale/rotten.
review_body: Stale nuts. Gross.

product_title: Honest Kids Goodness Grapeness USDA Organic Grape Juice Thirst Quencher Pouches 8 Pk
review_headline: These stupid pouches are so ill designed that I have to ...
review_body: Lost a customer! These stupid pouches are so ill designed that I have to carry a knife with me just to cut a slit (and then spill all over myself) in order to get a sip. How do they expect parents to put this in their child's lunches if I can't open it myself?? I have an entire 3 boxes bought from Sam's Club to get rid of now. Dumb, dumb, dumb marketing. Never again.

product_title: Stash Premium Loose Leaf Tea, 16 Ounce Pouch
review_headline: ... smells and tastes almost rotten for lack of a better word. I will go back to using Davidson's ...
review_body: The tea smells and tastes almost rotten for lack of a better word. I will go back to using Davidson's Earl Grey its both better tasting and cheaper!

product_title: Road's End Organics Gluten Free Mac & Chreese Alfredo Style, Organic, 6-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 12)
review_headline: Vile stuff--avoid, avoid, avoid
review_body: The \\"Chreese\\" sauce mix appears to be equal parts garlic powder, nutritional yeast, and rancid sand. Cooking it made my kitchen smell like the floor of a pizzeria. The macaroni is the type of rice pasta that goes directly from gritty and gummy to mushy. I regret exposing my blameless kitchen utensils to this slop.

product_title: Roland Chocolate Decorations
review_headline: avoid!
review_body: terrible!  packaging was ridiculous!  chocolate just place in a simple plastic bag and shoved into the box.  melted and stuck together.

product_title: Sea Best 150/250 Cooked Salad Shrimp, 2 Pound
review_headline: Wonderful but avoid if you are sensitive to antibiotics
review_body: I really like these but I needed to soak them in several changes of water. I know most farmed seafood from other countries are treated with antibiotics and my body's reaction to eating these was very similar to my reaction to amoxicilian. My husband had not reaction, so be cautious if you react to antibiotics.

product_title: Assorted Sugar Free Jordan Almonds 1 LB Bag - Oh! Nuts
review_headline: The coated almonds actually made me ill.
review_body: The coated almonds actually made me ill. I tried them on three different occasions to make sure it was nothing else. It was the almonds. I tried. The packaging is generic. The nutritional information is unreadable because it is a clear sticker with black text that is then placed on a dark green package.

product_title: Pistachios Shelled Raw Unsalted, 2Lbs
review_headline: These nuts were so stale and many were rotten. ...
review_body: These nuts were so stale and many were rotten. I returned the pistachios and purchase some right from the grower in CA. I was rather dissapointed.

product_title: Quoc Viet Foods "Hue" Style Beef Flavored Soup Base, 12 oz jar (1 unit)
review_headline: QuocViet lower their quality. Soup base not dry as the ones from my previous orders. Smell like rotten food. Not recommend.
review_body:
If there is 0 star, I would choose for this product. Terrible quality. It made my soup like rotten food. Quoc Viet makes their products going down in quality. I used this soup base since 2010. I did love them. But for this time, their quality is going down. The base is not dry enough. And it's smell is awful. But I did try. Then I must pour all my soup to drain.
Vietnamese customers should stop using this soup base. Not recommend.

product_title: Enjoy Life Not Nuts Mix
review_headline: Bad packaging for food allergy products-avoid!!
review_body: We ordered a bulk bag of this yummy trail mix, however it came without any labeling whatever. It did not even show up in an " Enjoy life" box as their other products do. The large bag it came in had no labeling on it-- which is no good if the whole reason you buy products is because they are labeled for allergens. It just came in an UNSEALED ziplock bag. Who the hades packaged it and where? This stuff really matters when you are buying certified nut/allergen free products. Will never get the bulk package if this stuff again. Walk on the age side and get the individually packaged bags. I'm disappointed that Enjoy life would send their products out this way.

product_title: Bolthouse Farms DAILY GREENS "Kale, Spinach, Romaine" 15.2 oz (12 Count)
review_headline: Made me sick for a few hours
review_body: Wish I had read these reviews before buying. Like most people, I love Bolthouse products. Today I felt like a I needed a little kick start to my week - what a better way to start to than a green drink! Could not have made a worse choice. I spent the first hour after chugging it (because I couldn't stand to sip it) running back and forth to the bathroom vomiting each time. It was like my body rejected it from the minute I drank it. I am no stranger to juicing, and although the mean green isn't my favorite thing on the planet, it's still infinitely more tolerable than this thing. I still have a headache, but so glad I'm not the only one. I thought for sure either the bottle had "gone bad".

product_title: Impra Flavored Green Tea Gift Pack (8 Flavors), 80-Count Tea Bags (Pack of 5)
review_headline: IMPRA GREEN TEA made me very sick.
review_body: Sickening Tea!!  I bought the Impra Green Tea Organic Ceylon and had some with breakfast and 3 hours later vomited.  Ive never been so sick.  I thought it was just a fluke until a made another cup of it months later and it was horribly bitter and I vomited again.  My stomach got all bloated and I was horribly ill the whole day.  I felt like I was poisoned.  I Usually drink the Honest Tea  green tea and love it. Never got sick.  But the IMPRA is horrible.  Dont buy it.

product_title: Honest Fizz Soda - Professor Fizz - 12 Oz - 6 Pack
review_headline: made us sick
review_body: This stuff gave me a hypoglycemic reaction and caused achy backs in both my husband and I.  This product tastes putridly SWEET and leaves a coating in your throat. We think that the erythritol is the problem.

product_title: O.N.E. Coconut Water Splash (Pack of 12)
review_headline: I received this damaged, broken, and rotten. ...
review_body: I received this damaged, broken, and rotten. VERY dissatisfied with this. Poured my hard earned money down the drain. Not okay.

product_title: Dial 00865 Soft Scrub 26-oz. Lemon Cleanser
review_headline: The lid is poorly designed and almost dangerous.
review_body: The cleanser works well enough but the top is so flimsy that it is breaking - both the lip that you use to pry it open and the little piece of plastic that serves a hinge for the lid. And this has bleach in it, not the sort of thing I want leaking or splashing as I try to use it.

product_title: Fresh Spanish Plums (Ciruela) 2 Lbs
review_headline: rotten fruit
review_body: The ciruelas were rotten and beat up, and didn't taste well.

product_title: ZICO Pure Premium Coconut Water, Natural, 33.8 fl oz Container (Count of 6)
review_headline: Half the order was spoiled rotten...
review_body: When I opened my "pack of 6" I was dumbfounded. The 6 containers were just thrown into a garbage bag.  They were all banged up and damp as if they (or at least one) was leaking.  I opened one up and it smelled and tasted fine so I decided to just go with it.  That was a mistake...3 of the 6 containers ended up being spoiled.  I opened it and it smelled awful, looked awful, and (yes, I took a sip) tasted horrendous. So quick recap...half my order was rotten.  I wish I could give this a zero star review.

product_title: Spectrum Naturals - Coconut Oil Unrefined, 14 oz liquid
review_headline: It smells HORRIBLE. It smells like rotten cheese or something rancid
review_body:
I just bought the Spectrum Virgin Coconut Oil Unrefined from Whole Foods. It smells HORRIBLE. It smells like rotten cheese or something rancid. I trusted this brand because I bought refined last time and I fell in love with the mild coconut odor.

Can someone explain to me why this happened? Was it a bad batch or something?

I just wasted $8 on this jar that smells like old cheese.

product_title: Roasted Macadamia Nuts (Unsalted) 1LB Bag
review_headline: We got so sick! All three of us!
review_body: This product was not as advertised it contained cottonseed oil. Very oily tasted decent but we got so sick went back and double checked the bag to discover I missed it saying cotton seed oil. Very disappointed.

product_title: Fillo Appetizers Three Cheese Blend, 12 servings
review_headline: good product, dangerous inadequate shipping
review_body: We now live in a rural area and were missing Greek food. The tyropitas were good (same brand sold in supermarkets back east) when cooked, despite the fact the packaging was inadequate and they thawed during shipping.  Needs more insulation and probably dry ice in addition.  We were willing to try refreezing and cooking because it was our only option for a taste of Greece.

product_title: Zico Pure Premium Coconut Water Bottles
review_headline: Awful "added" flavor. avoid avoid avoid!
review_body: The "natural flavor" is awful. It tastes nothing like normal coconut water. Another reviewed described it as "plastic-y" thats in the right direction. It tastes a lot like they got immitation coconut flavor and added it on top of coconut water. I didn't realize the mistake that this wasn't just normal/natural coconut water. Ended up throwing out the entire case, no one wanted more than one sip.

product_title: Smuckers® Jelly Jam Assortment #4 (grape, strawberry, mixed fruit) - 200 case
review_headline: But they all taste good, even though I tend to avoid Mixed Fruit ...
review_body: The Mixed Fruit Jelly is really watery, which makes for a mess. There is also 2x the amount of Grape Jelly as there is Strawberry and Mixed Fruit. I want more Strawberry! But they all taste good, even though I tend to avoid Mixed Fruit because of how messy and clumsy it is (it just pops right out of the biscuit and leaves a runny mess), so I can't rate it too lowly considering the bulk discount.

product_title: Healthworks Certified Organic Goji Berries
review_headline: I got sick on these - I ate a handful ...
review_body: I got sick on these - I ate a handful and about 1:00 AM had awful stomach cramps that sent me to my doctor.  Although I heard you are not suppose to eat these by themselves

product_title: Omaha Steaks 1 (1 lb. pkg.) Snow Crab Cocktail Claws
review_headline: Not stinky--stanky!
review_body: I've ordered these before, though usually direct from Omaha. This time, they smelled and tasted fishy. I know crab has a smell, but this didn't smell like crab. It stunk -- and not in a good way. I'll never order again--from either place because I can't get the smell out of my psyche,

product_title: Dave's Gourmet Sauce, 5 Ounce
review_headline: Good think it made me sick
review_body: Never drink alot of this stuff.  I thought I was going to die.  Good think it made me sick, or I would have been burning the next day or so.

product_title: Earth's Best Organic Whole Grain Multi-Grain Cereal, 8 Ounce (Pack of 12)
review_headline: New boxes appear to be tainted. Made son sick.
review_body: We used to LOVE this stuff. My son could eat it and not get sick. Then they apparently changed the formula. He now gets food poisoning like symptoms anytime he eats it. It no longer comes in nice fluffy flakes. It is now ground up very fine like rice flour and turns into a grey goopey gluey mess when mixed with liquid. We had a box of the old stuff and both my husband and I tasted the new stuff and that old stuff. Old stuff tastes nice and fresh and smells nice. The new stuff smells like mold and mildew. We alerted the company after a trip to Medcheck with our infant. They sent us some flimsy gift boxes to mail the packages back to them with some coupons for MORE OF THE TAINTED CEREAL. Bad PR right there. It wasn't even just a bad batch. We've bought over 20 boxes of this at various stores around our city and ALL the new boxes are the overground, grey, mildew smelling stuff. Not one still had the nice clean smelling fluffy flakes. This should be taken off the market until the figure out what went wrong in the manufacturing process. When it makes your kid sick enough they need immediate care, it might not be the safest product. Really sad about this because my son truly did love this stuff. Very disappointed in the company for not stepping up and working to keep their food safe for infants.

product_title: Deep Garlic Naan (4 pc)
review_headline: Thawed and dangerous
review_body: They came in a plain Manila envelope and were warm even though the package said keep frozen. I felt I couldn't eat them since I had no idea how long they had been thawed :(

product_title: Eden Foods Organic Red Quinoa, 16 oz
review_headline: avoid like the plague
review_body:
Falsely (and illegally?) calls itself "organic" -- there is no USDA Organic logo on this product, showing certification.

Avoid this company's products like the plague; CEO Michael Potter was charged in 1988 and later served jail time for misrepresenting Edensoy soy milk as an infant formula, after a Canadian infant developed a rare eye and bone disorder as a result of vitamin deficiencies -- just an early indication of the way this company perpetually defrauds the public.

Now it seeks to impose its "religious" "beliefs" on female employees by denying them coverage for birth control in employer-provided health insurance, and Potter says he doesn't care if it's "Jack Daniels or birth control," the government doesn't have the right to tell him what to do -- so it's not a "religious belief" that's motivating him, it's simply "anti-government," which we can interpret to mean anti-tax and anti-regulation, just another worshipper in the church of greed.

Since he has no regard whatsoever for the health and welfare of his employees and strives to be an anti-American tax dodger, I can assume there are plenty of shortcuts in their processing methods, the products are not truly organic, and their standards are as low as they can get away with, so I wouldn’t feed their “food” to my dog or even to pigs, which need real nutrition to produce ham, bacon, and pork chops.

product_title: Health Garden Kosher Birch Xylitol 1 Lbs. Product of USA (Not From Corn)
review_headline: Can be dangerous to pets
review_body: I purchased this supposedly natural product for my homemade toothpaste mixture but never used it. There is a lot of controversy about xylitol. It is dangerous to pets e.g. dogs. I wanted to return it but I missed the return window. I'll use it as a pesticide instead. Do your research before purchasing.

product_title: Zavida Hazelnut Vanilla Premium Whole Bean Coffee
review_headline: Revised--Smells like ammonia
review_body: I have to change my review of these beans from 5 stars to 1 star.  I had smelled a bit of an ammonia-like smell while drinking coffee with these beans, but I thought it was just a bit of soap residue on my coffee cup (sort of smelled like the Ms. Myers soap that we use).  Well, I switched to another coffee for the holiday and then when I came back to this coffee post vacation, I realized that the ammonia-like smell is not the soap--it's definitely the beans, as I used the same cup.  I have gone through probably 4 or 5 bags with the same issue so it's not confined to one shipment.  It's not overpowering, which is why I didn't stop using the beans but now I realized this is just a major product flaw.  Maybe there is ammonia or some other chemical used in the hazelnut flavoring, the packaging or whatever, but for me this makes the coffee completely undrinkable.  Hopefully the mfr will read this and do something about it.  Until then, I'm done and can't recommend the coffee.

product_title: Wolfgang Puck Organic Soup, 14.5 Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)
review_headline: avoid it
review_body: Terrible. Tasteless with inferior ingredients. My dog liked it, however.

product_title: Certified Organic Hard Red Wheat Sprouting Seed: Pre-Measured for 10"x20" Trays For Growing Wheatgrass to Juice, Grind for Flour & Bread, Ornamental Wheat Grass – Non-GMO
review_headline: Seeds are rotten and NON organic! It's scam
review_body: I grow wheatgrass for a long time and have a lot of experience but this is the first time .... I got the rotten  seeds from this seller. The package was different from ad on Amazon. It's just plastic bag with NO sign and sertificate that these seeds are actually organic!!! It's absolutely illegal to sell "organic" without any sertificate. The seller is scam. DON'T BUY IT!!!!!! STAY AWAY if you don't want to throw $30 away.

product_title: Good Health Glories Kettle Sweet Potato Chips, 5-Ounce (Pack of 12)
review_headline: Not enough salt, got sick of them...
review_body:
If you LOVE sweet potato fries and chips already - these are probably awesome for you and the one comment I'll make is that they don't have enough salt.

If you LIKE sweet potato fries and chips, I am almost certain you will get sick of these half way through the bag or at least by the 2nd/3rd bag (assuming this listing is still for the 12-pack).

The quality of these chips is fantastic and I can't really blame the manufacturer for their product, it is exactly what it should be (olive-oil cooked, sweet potato chips) -- I think it is primarily the light salt that makes these not as good as they could be.

My wife had the same comment and friends that we gave the chips too; they just petered out on eating them and described them as "meh" after a few days.

Like I said though, if you already love sweet potato products and aren't a huge salt junky (I am assuming you aren't because you are eating healthy chips :) then you'll love these just fine.

product_title: Annie's Homegrown Organic Snack Mix Bunnies
review_headline: It's stinky
review_body: It tastes really, really good; but it is really smelly. So when my toddler drops little bits on the floor or gets the cheese powder on his face I can smell it everywhere.

product_title: Badger- Anti-Bug Balm
review_headline: Ineffective and dangerous
review_body:
I have applied Badger Anti-Bug Balm for 4 days and I have consistently observed that it is:
- extremely ineffective against mosquitoes. On two occasions, I saw mosquitoes land on where I had just applied the cream. I shouldn't be surprised. After doing some research I found out that some studies suggest that citronella keeps mosquitoes away for ~30 min, while DEET lasts at least one order of magnitude longer.
- dangerous to my health. Every time I applied the balm I noticed a light pain in my heart and that it was beating more heavily than usual. Worse I had significant shortness of breath every single time I applied it (and I didn't experience at any other time during my testing period). I also noticed a rash on the application area (although this only happened once). After doing some research I found out that all of these symptoms are typical with the active ingredients used.

While it is generally understood that natural products are not as effective as synthetic products, the following is often not accepted: Just because something consists of 100% natural ingredients doesn't imply that it is safe. And just because something is synthetic, doesn't imply that it is dangerous.

product_title: Trader Joe's  Chocolate Raspberry Sticks
review_headline: rotten candy
review_body: Will never buy these again. They were sour. Had to throw them out. Trader Joe's never returned my emails. So as far as I'm concerned, they're not worth dealing with

product_title: Arginaid, 0.32 Ounce Packets (Pack of 56)
review_headline: It contains dangerous Aspartame
review_body: It mixes easily and apparently goes down without trouble but I did not realize when ordering that it contains approx. 2% aspartame which is known to promote brain tumors, seizures and many other side effects including the symptoms of Desert Storm Syndrome. Two of the three substances it  breaks down into are wood alcohol and formaldehyde. Many people work very hard to avoid this ingredient. Our own son developed grand mal seizures from Aspartame. The product would fulfill the purposes for which it is purchased (and without the unwanted side effects) without this poisonous sweetener. The presence of Aspartame should be prominently noted in the information about the product prior to people's purchases.

product_title: Gourmet Chocolate Apples
review_headline: Icy cold, apple tasted rotten.
review_body: Sadly, not worth the money. I ordered them because I love sharing such items, but these were not worth the money.

product_title: Special K Chocolatey Delight Cereal, 13.4-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 4)
review_headline: Makes me sick
review_body:
The cereal is basically like normal Special K - huge manufactured-looking fake fakes of overly sweet mystery grain (and about 30% molasses). I've always found it so strange that this cereal TRIES to look healthy (like bran flakes), and in fact tastes just as bland; yet also tastes so sickly sweet.

But this is almost worth eating for the weirdness of the chocolate alone. It all sink to the bottom so you end up with a huge mouth-bomb of chocolate to eat at the end. Nice right? WRONG. I chewed a grape-sized blob of this chocolate for over 5 mins like a cow, and it hadn't even melted in the slightest.

The strangest thing about this cereal is that every time I have tried it (we got through 3 boxes) - and I mean EVERY time - I would feel somewhat nauseous. It would kick in about 10 mins after eating, and last for almost 30 mins. I'm not allergic to to any of the ingredients as far as I know, and neither am I a fussy health-food fanatic, but this stuff literally makes me feel sick.

I had to force myself to throw the box out to stop me going back to it in moments of weakness.

product_title: Happy Baby Organic Baby Food Stage 1 Starting Solids Variety Pack, 16/3.5 oz
review_headline: food is rotten!
review_body: I was horrified - the green beans packet came out as liquid-green fluid and my son spat it out immediately. I tasted it and it was sour/rotten. I checked the mango one which seemed fine but then the sweet potatoes came out as a brownish-tinged mush until about half-way squeezed out which was then a more normal orange color. The expiration on the label says "Dec 2014" but these are clearly rotten packets of food. This is potentially harmful and should not be sold to unknowing mothers!

product_title: HAPPYBABY Organic Puffs Sampler (6 Count)
review_headline: No gluten, but kinda dangerous
review_body:
Just want to confirm the product ingredients on the actual label are just white rice and brown rice, no wheat.

There isn't much difference in taste or ingredients between flavors, BTW.

My 7 month old learned how to get them into her mouth effectively over the course of a couple days. Now, right at 8 months, she has just about got that pincer grasp down.

On the other hand, she puts too many in her mouth at once and has choked (really just gagged) twice, one time barfing in order to unstick the offending puff from her uvula. I think if they were made of only white rice, they would dissolve more quickly.

product_title: Healthworks Certified Organic Goji Berries
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body: These berries made me deathly ill. After eating some in my smoothie I realized they were moldy. If you order theses and they are all stuck together return them they are old and will make you sick

product_title: 4C Totally Light Bonus Variety Pack, Energy Rush, 18-Count Boxes
review_headline: Lightly carbonated - makes me lightly ill
review_body: The taste for the most part is okay, but I have a hard time getting past the salty lightly carbonated taste. It seems to concentrate at the bottom of the cup too so the top tastes fine and then towards the end it makes me gag. I wish they had these flavors with a non carbonated or no sodium bicarbonate version. Nothing like drinking flavored baking soda water.. yuck. It's going to take me a long time to go through these.

product_title: Manitoba Harvest Organic Hemp Hearts Raw Shelled Hemp Seeds
review_headline: Made me VERY sick
review_body:
I'm not sure why but these hemp hearts made me violently ill. I had never tried hemp hearts before these so perhaps I have an allergy. I don't think the cause of my upset stomach was due to the manufacturing process, rather, I think my body just does not tolerate hemp well.

Manitoba Harvest seems like a good company so I don't want to blame them for this. I've read reports of others having very bad reactions to hemp hearts from other companies as well. PLEASE DO YOUR RESEARCH BEFORE CONSUMING!

If you aren't sure of how they will make you feel start with a very small amount and see how it makes you feel. I ate the recommended three tablespoons and I vomited repeatedly each time I tried eating them.

Hemp hearts do wonders for some but they wreaked havoc on me.

product_title: Kesar Mango Box - Fresh Indian Mangoes (Free Shipping)
review_headline: 6 mangos were rotten and bad
review_body: I bought 2 boxes one of the box had  6 mangos rotten bad...I hope they fix that problem thank you

product_title: Hamburger Popin' Cookin' kit DIY candy by Kracie
review_headline: Fun to make, but made me terribly ill!!!
review_body: This was so cute and so fun to make and really didn't taste half bad.  However, I leave only 2 stars because consuming this made me terribly ill with vomiting and what not it was awful.  Would not buy again

product_title: Zantrex-3, 84 Capsules Zantrex 3 …
review_headline: I am so sick! Don't take this!
review_body: If I could rate this lower I would. Do not take this medication. I have been taking it for a week and have never felt so sick in my life. I started with one pill twice a day and bumped it up to two twice a day. Didn't make a difference. I feel so sick every time I eat. Dizzy, nauseous, headaches. I lost three pounds, but this isn't worth it. I feel like total garbage. And I tried to work out today and felt like I was going to pass out when I finished. I'm going back to eating healthy and exercising. I think this is my body screaming for me to stop. I also just heard from someone I know that diet pills screwed up her body so bad she almost had to get dialysis!!! And by the way, we're in our 20's!! Stay away from this!!

product_title: The Sprout House Certified Organic Non-gmo Hulled Sunflower Seeds 1 Pound
review_headline: It rotted!
review_body: didn't sprout, just rotted and I have been doing sprouts for years. I tried 3 batches, all turned brown and smelled.

product_title: Boost Glucose Control Rich Chocolate Ready To Drink, 8 oz., 12 Count
review_headline: Yea low sugar!  Boo icky ingredients!
review_body: I really wanted to like these.  There's little sugar and the price is right.  However, I fear gmo ingredients in this stuff, so I just let my husband drink them.  He adores them.  Besides drinking a whole one from time to time, he will add drops of it to his morning coffee in place of sugar or a sugar substitute.

product_title: San Francisco Bay One Cup
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body: After reading the reviews I felt this coffee was promising.  Upon arrival the first thing I noticed was the cute little filters instead of the cups - which worked fine in my Keuring.  The taste was ok.  Nothing great, nothing bad.  Except I noticed I felt sick to my stomach every single day I drank this coffee.  When I switched to my normal brand it went back to normal.  I drank it again thinking I was just being crazy and was sick again.  Wouldn't recommend it at all and really don't even want to know why I got sick.

product_title: Welch's Berries 'N Cherries Fruit Snacks 10 pk
review_headline: Spoiled and disgusting, nothing like what you buy in store, overpriced please avoid
review_body:
Spoiled and disgusting, nothing like what you buy in store, overpriced please avoid

Like I said I was completely disappointed.

product_title: PUR Gum Aspartame Free Tray Packs, 9 Count (Pack of 12)
review_headline: Flavor is icky
review_body: I love pur gum in the spearmint and peppermint flavors, but the pomegranate flavor is not very good.  I would not recommend it.

product_title: Tofu Shirataki - Macaroni 8 oz. 10 Pack
review_headline: This product is horrendously awful. Made me sick to my stomach.
review_body: I purchased this product based on some positive reviews and the desire to be able to consume low carb or no carb pasta. What a concept! The reviews discussed the foul odor when opening the bags (which, by the way, must be refrigerated taking up precious refrigerator space). The warnings of the foul odor were very understated. Instructions per other users and some recipes I have were to rinse and drain and microwave and then rinse and drain again and microwave again - I did it three times - but this did not sufficiently remove the odor which is truly nauseating. But I persisted and prepared a sauce and consumed the noodles. They were truly awful - rubbery, slimy even, and then there was that lingering odor which ended up on my hands - like fishy formaldihyde - I felt nauseated for the rest of the evening.  I contacted Amazon for a return/refund but the outside seller partnered with Amazon refused a return of grocery items. I hope this review will prevent others from throwing away $37 and ruining an evening to an upset stomach. Yucccccck

product_title: Doctor in the Kitchen Flackers Organic Flax Seed Crackers
review_headline: only worth the effort if you need to avoid wheat
review_body:
The look is not that great, the taste is not that great, but if you are looking to avoid wheat, maybe is your only choice...
For me, this was an interesting test, not one I'm going to repeat.
Plus, half the bag was just tiny pieces and power.

product_title: Bawls Guarana - Case of 24 Bottles
review_headline: Made me violently ill
review_body: Drank 1 of them, and started to get a sore throat and a runny nose. Figured I just caught a cold from whoever packaged the order or something, but then I had severe nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea for the next 2 days. Just gonna throw the rest away. Don't know what happened, but you better believe I'll never order again!

product_title: Foods Alive Organic Toasted Hemp Seeds with Sea Salt, 12-Ounce Bags (Pack of 3)
review_headline: Kinda icky tasting.
review_body: They taste like, well, hemp seeds - dirt and popcorn old maids.  I'm sure they're healthy but they are hard to swallow.

product_title: BeanBoozled Jelly Beans Spinner Gift Box 3.5oz
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body: I wouldn't recommend this to those with a weak stomach.  The hours and day following I was sick to my stomach having to take acid reducers. The canned dog food, skunk, and booger do not fade even after eating the toothpaste bean. It will give you and your friends horrendous breath and a short lived laugh. Even if you don't swallow the bean problems will still arise. I'd say take them out of the box and put them in a bag to give to an enemy on Valentines day as a "secret admirer".

product_title: Greenlee's Bakery Cinnamon Bread 20 Ounce Loaf (Pack of 2)
review_headline: Decent coffee cake, but dangerous if toasted
review_body: This isn't really what most folks would call bread, because its texture and huge amounts of fat and sugar put it more in the class of coffee cake.  Because this "Cinnamon Bread" is loaded with sugar you need to be really careful to use a wooden tongs or some other means to remove from the toaster, as the sugar will take on the characteristics of white phosphorus and give you really nasty burns on your fingers.  There should be a warning and please, don't let your kids toast this without supervision.  Just saying.

product_title: Yamamotoyama Teriyaki Nori Snack, Wasabi, 0.13-Ounce (Pack of 12)
review_headline: Smelled fine... tasted rotten. NOT eligible for return.
review_body: If you love Nori snacks, try the Annie Chun's Wasabi or the Natural Garden Wasabi versions. This one tasted bad. Fishy. Not good. Annie Chun's is our favourite (a little spicier than the Natural Garden ones).

product_title: General Mills, Honey Nut Cheerios, Medley Crunch Cereal, 13.1oz Box (Pack of 4)
review_headline: Cheerios Medley Crunch may be so sweet that it makes you sick
review_body:
First off, I really like how Cheerios Medley Crunch tastes. It has regular looking cheerios mixed with flakes including small almonds and an occasional berry flavor of some sort. So why the low rating? This cereal is far too sweet and it sends me to the bathroom unlike anything else I've ever eaten. I became so sick from this last week that I thought I was going to have to visit the doctor. I had my Dad try this cereal and it did the same thing to him about 2 hours after eating. We aren't diabetics so it's nothing to do with that and we don't have any food allergies that we know of.

I eat all kinds of cereal but I just can't recommend this one after what it continually (as in 3 days in a row) made me sick. It can't be good for you at all with as sweet as it is.

product_title: NongShim Tempura Udon Noodle Bowl, 9.73 Ounce Bowls (Pack of 6)
review_headline: Tastes like rotten fish.
review_body:
The cooking process is annoying. The product itself has a mild fish taste, but not in a good way. It tastes like old fish. For the price I was expecting a lot more and higher quality vegetables. Also it was not very spicy, had to add my own hot sauce.

For my money I'd rather just buy some generic raman and add and egg and a scoop of peanut butter.

product_title: Matcha DNA Certified Organic Matcha Green Tea
review_headline: Nasty taste and gives me a ill feeling
review_body: I like tea but this stuff has a very bitter taste and I get a feeling like I have ingested toxic material that lasts for a couple of days.  I'm concerned that there is something unhealthy for me in this tea.

product_title: Natural Value Coconut Milk, 13.5-Ounce Containers
review_headline: Trying to avoid additives.......
review_body: I am always trying to avoid additives and preservatives so I wanted to try this brand. I wasn't able to find this product locally, and being an optimist I bought a pack of 12. The product tastes good but it separates even when heated. It's just not appetizing to look at separated coconut milk floating in my coffee. Wanted to like it but I guess I'll go back to my other brand which has guar gum added but no other preservatives - it's a smoother product.

product_title: Roasted Pistachio Meats (10 Pound Case) (Salted)
review_headline: These nuts were stale with broken pieces, some of them rotten.
review_body: These nuts were stale with broken, discolored pieces. Many of the nuts were rotten or moldy. The taste was not good.

product_title: Coffee Bean Direct Orange Pekoe Loose Leaf Black Tea, 2 Pound Bag
review_headline: If you like iced tea, avoid this stuff
review_body: I should have believed the negative reviews of this stuff.  It has almost no aroma, and virtually no taste.  As others have said, it is full of twigs, far more than I have ever seen in any other loose tea.  I think it is of low quality and also old.  If I try to use double (to get more 'flavor'), the taste is almost undrinkably disgusting.  I've been mixing it half-and-half with Lipton loose tea just to try to use it up.  I will not purchase this tea again.  I do not believe that this is a one-off or a "bad batch" since reviewers have posted comments similar to mine about this tea over a period of several years.  Very disappointing.  I've been mixing it half-and-half with Lipton loose tea just to try to use it up.

product_title: Gluten Free All Purpose Baking Flour
review_headline: Feeling very ill
review_body: Since Jules is trying to build her business again I had to switch over to Bob's Red Mill. My first issue is Garbanzo flour. The stuff tastes awful. I am not sure why people like it.... My second issue, with in 30 min to an hour of consuming this I became very ill. I feel like I was glutened or one of the flours did not agree with me. I have heard complaints from celiacs and those very sensitive to gluten concerning reactions from Bob's products. They also had a recall in september 2013 because it had too much gluten. I think I may have picked up this batch around that time.... May be it was an error, but when a product is said to be gluten free and it's not, that's a problem for me. I shouldn't have to worry about getting sick from a product that claims to be gluten free, at any time.

product_title: Baby's Only Organic Dairy with DHA & ARA Formula, 12.7 Ounce
review_headline: Try to avoid if you have another choice
review_body: My daughter have difficulty to digest this formula. We mixed the formula with warm water, then shaked it. Some of the powder didn't melt and then sticked together to create some little solid material. My daughter's face was turned really red and she had a hard time when she went to her #2. She was even cried out too. The only star I gave to this product because the taste was not bad when I tried it personally.

product_title: Ener-G Egg Replacer -- 16 oz
review_headline: Has made my family sick
review_body: Both my husband and my daughter have thrown up after I've added this to my pancake mix.  I'm going back to flax as an egg replacer even though it will cause a slightly gritty texture.  I tried but no more wood pulp for us.

product_title: Popin' Cookin'
review_headline: Cute and icky!
review_body:
So fun to play with, however it doesn't taste good.
Still cute for kids to play with on a rainy afternoon!

product_title: Bolthouse Farms DAILY GREENS "Kale, Spinach, Romaine" 15.2 oz (12 Count)
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body:
I did not have that much of a problem with the taste. It was not great but I though it was drinkable considering it is all greens with a little bit of lemon in a juice.
The problem was when I was digesting it I felt nauseous like wanted to throw up. I did not have anything else for breakfast so I am sure it was the juice.
I checked the expiration date and it showed that it still had a month left of shelf life.
I had tried other Boathouse Farm fruit juices and I liked all of them. I am not sure what happened here but I won't be buying this product again.

product_title: Chef Boyardee, Chicken Alfredo, 15oz Can (Pack of 6)
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body: I ate half of it and had to stop. It did not taste good but I kept eating. My mistake as 10 minutes after I threw it away, my stomach started hurting. Then came the nauseous feeling. After taking some medicine, I had bathroom problems for two days. Thanks Chef.

product_title: Eat Your Vegetables Sea Salt Veggie Chips, 4.5 Ounce
review_headline: They made me sick, my body is repelling them!!
review_body:
I have tried mostly every brand of potato chips, bean chips, veggie chips, I'm a chips junkie!!

I was excited to try these since they seemed like a healthier alternative to potato chips, plus, they were on sale \\"buy one get one free\\" at my neighborhood supermarket, sounded like a win-win.

So, I bring one of the bags to work since I like to snack in between hours and just after opening the bag I notice a rancid odor coming out of it, the chips did not look appetizing,, I checked the expiration date and it was August-2014, and I was really hungry so I ate a few. They taste really bad!!!! I tried putting some hot sauce to disguise the ugly taste since I was really hungry and that's all I could eat at the moment, but they tasted so bad I threw them away.

Just the smell of the bag from the trash can close to my desk made me want to throw up, it's been a couple hours and I'm still feeling sick.

There's no way I'm opening the second bag, it's up for grabs if any one is interested.

product_title: Thin Mints Cookies
review_headline: icky sticky
review_body: Some how these cookies do not taste like they did years ago, they must of changed something,they were icky sticky I had not bought them in years and so tried again and was disappointed

product_title: Navitas Naturals Organic Maca Powder, 1 Pound Pouches
review_headline: Made me very sick
review_body: This is marketed as a raw food but contains enzymes that are slightly toxic if not cooked. I consumed a tsp of maca powder 1 week ago and am still experiencing severe stomach pains every time I eat food. Package does not give any warnings.

product_title: Amy's Spinach Pizza with Rice Crust, Organic, 14-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 8)
review_headline: Really icky.
review_body: The other reviewers said it, but it is worth repeating.  Yuck.  The crust is really really weird and the sauce magnifies the weird texture with weird taste.  The first time I had one of these things, I thought it must have been from a bad batch or something because I didn't think anyone would sell something that..icky.  The second time, I took one bite and threw it out.  My daughter accidentally grabbed me another one of these the other day instead of my usual Udi's gf pizza (YUM, btw).  I just threw it out without opening it.  Not worth the time, money and disappointment.

product_title: Made in Nature Dates Figs and Apricots
review_headline: tasted rotten
review_body: If you steep these figs in warm water for a few minutes, the rotten flavor really comes out -- I could not finish the bag (and I usually love dried figs).  Compared to the black figs from my local coop, these are a huge disappointment.

product_title: Viva Naturals Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 54 Ounce
review_headline: Completely rotten
review_body: My order was/is completely rotten. Smells horribly. Made me dry heave from the awful smell and the expiration date is not even near. Won't buy again. What a waste of 54oz and money!!

product_title: Chinese Medicinal Tea-Detox Triple Leaf Tea 20 Bag
review_headline: Awful! Made me sick!
review_body: This made me so sick. Up all night with horrible stomach ache!!  Can't take care of my kids the next day.  I've had many teas and this is awful!  Hoping they return!

product_title: R.Y.S.E Guanabana Fruit Soursop, Graviola, 2-3 Lb
review_headline: The fruit was rotten
review_body:
Unfortunately I received the fruit and it was rotten because it was not wrapped carefully.

I hope for this kind of fruit it shout be wrapped in a small ice bag to keep it perfect when receiving it as we see it on the website.

product_title: Bumble Bee Solid White Albacore Tuna
review_headline: I think the tuna is sometimes rotten or something
review_body: I got this order a couple times through Subscribe and Save, and some cans were always off-color, but I ignored that since they seemed OK otherwise.  I think the cans aren't kept in the right temperature or something.  I never have that problem in the same brand cans I get from my local store.  This last time there were black spots in one of the cans, like something was growing there.  That's the last straw for me.

product_title: Poppy Seeds - 50 Pound Bag
review_headline: What is this poison that they treat these seeds with?  Is it dangerous?
review_body: Honeyville now sell total bunk chemically treated seeds.  Why? Is it to make them not viable.  Great, poison people so the seeds won't germinate.  This should be criminal.  What if someone has a compromised immune system, and the crap they treat these seeds with seriously harms them?  Greedy scumbags don't care about people's health, just how much money they make this quarter.

product_title: SodaStream SodaMix
review_headline: Made me sick to my stomach
review_body: I drink lots of diet red bull and monster without issues.  This stuff make me sick to my stomach and I was shaking.  Very weird product, won't use it again.

product_title: Quoc Viet Foods Beef Flavored "PHO" Soup Base, 10 oz. Jar, 1 Unit
review_headline: Be aware of the ingredients if you're trying to avoid MSG
review_body:
The main thing I want to comment on is the misleading labeling. It says that there is no MSG, but "yeast extract" is where they can hide the MSG. Don't take my word for it if you don't believe it, if you do some research you'll find MSG has all kinds of names such as "natural flavors."

Only tried it once and don't recommend it.

product_title: Antica Tostatura Triestina Moka Espresso Ground Tin
review_headline: avoid!
review_body:
-tastes burn (perhaps grind is too fine for my espresso, i don't think so...)
-crema is not good at all
-smell and tastes just stale ( if some people claims that lavazza or illy are stale, they should try this one!!)
-even bustello o la llave (too dark for me) tastes better than this one and cost the 1/3
-better go with lavazza or even better local fresh roaster.

product_title: Evolution Fresh Sweet Greens WITH Lemon Juice 15.2 FL OZ (12 Count)
review_headline: Must be some sort of sick joke
review_body: I purchased this \\"beverage\\" at Starbucks the other day, hoping it would quench my thirst and desire for nutrient-rich, greens-based sustenance on a day when I was feeling a big sluggish. I've tried many other greens-based drinks like this in the past, which usually try and add some fruit juice for a sweet balance to the overwhelming taste of some of the ingredients. This drink makes no such attempt at all, and upon first taste, I immediately cringed and coughed with shock. The only thing that attempts to break up this grass-fest is a hint of lemon, but it doesn't do anything productive and almost makes it worse. Imagine mowing the lawn, running over a lemon at some point, and then having to clean the blades with your tongue. You're on the way to understanding what this drink tastes like. I know my negative review sounds extreme, and Amazon has joke reviews going on all over the place, but this is dead serious. All 3 other people I was with said the same thing, and none of us was able to take more than a sip at a time without making audible noises and motions of utter disgust. I honestly have no idea how this made it past the testing phase of production...they must have just asked one person whose diet consists primarily of leaves and weeds. If you are SUPER SUPER into grass and greens-based drinks, then you might be okay with this...I have to assume most people will throw away about 75% of this drink when they buy it, as I did, hoping for something nutritious but at least somewhat drinkable. SO gross.

product_title: Navitas Naturals Organic Goji Berries
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body: Don't know if it's the berries or just this brand, but either way I think one star is appropriate to alert potential buyers that they could have a bad reaction, too. Maybe try a different brand in a smaller package first?

product_title: Viva Naturals Organic Extra Virgin Coconut Oil, 16 Ounce
review_headline: Received rotten oil, company did not care
review_body: Very concerned that I received basically rotten coconut oil that smelled like vomit.  Thankfully Amazon has refunded my purchase, but Viva Labs doesn't seem to care that a very bad batch of coconut oil is out there.  I tried calling customer service and the number did not work.  Then I emailed and got a form letter response that the matter was resolved.  Very disappointed and will not purchase from this particular company ever again.  Coconut oil that has gone bad can make you very ill, if you have purchased from this company and notice a strong rancid odor, please do not use it.

product_title: Kirkland Signature Organic No-Salt Seasoning, 14.5 Ounce
review_headline: I have a kidney problem and must avoid sodium
review_body: It is a chore finding a way to "spice up" my foods without using salt. This product, after several months use helps in that regard.

product_title: Kraft Easy Mac Original, 2.05-Ounce Microwave Cups (Pack of 36)
review_headline: Caution Caution Fire danger
review_body: My daughter followed the directions and the Kraft Easy Mac started a fire in the microwave.  She did put water in it!!!  Oh she set the microwave for 2 minutes.  Now a quick inexpensive snack is costing me time and about $2,000+ in damages.  Now we have thrown out our supply of this fire danger and started an insurance claim..  I DO NOT recommend this for anyone. The only reason it gets one star is I can't go any lower.  Kraft really needs to fix this issue before someones house burns down or a life is lost.

product_title: Wissotzky Wooden Tea Chests and Tea Box
review_headline: gave as gift made reciepent sick
review_body: I gave this gift of tea to my Mother who loves tea. The first cup she  told me made her sick. So now I'm on her bad gift list. I don't know if she has tried any of the other tea's for she no longer mentions it. I guess when something makes you sick you will choose not to try anything else.

product_title: Snickers Milk Chocolate Full Size Candy Bars - 12-Count
review_headline: Try to avoid
review_body:
I ordered a 12 count box and received a usps box with 12 loose candy bars thrown in to it. All of them had the expiry year conveniently wiped out

I really hope this review helps somebody else. There should be a way to give no stars

product_title: Kraft, Velveeta Cheesy Casseroles, Chili Cornbread, 11.1oz Box (Pack of 4)
review_headline: I think i'm gonna be sick.....
review_body: This is the worst box meal that I have ever tasted. I purchased it because I like chili and I like cornbread. But what this product does is take the WORST of both of those worlds and puts them together to try to make something edible. EPIC FAIL! This was so horrible that I wanted to throw it away. Luckily, I didn't have a huge serving. I told my wife that I wasn't going to eat it again. If my kids don't eat it, then I'm fine with that, too. Just NASTY!!!!

product_title: Albanese Assorted Gummi Bears 12 Flavor , 1.5 LB by Albanese [Foods]
review_headline: They're ok - avoid the grapefruit!
review_body: I was gifted some Plants versus Zombie gummies for Christmas and really enjoyed the blue gummies, so I went looking for gummies that have flavors beyond the typical red-yellow-green-white-orange. Some of them are great - the turquoise-ish watermelon gummies are delicious, as are the clear/white ones (banana? I have no idea). Some of the flavors are hard to say which fruit they're trying to be; but the colors seem pretty distinct, so at least they're consistently the same color-flavor expectation. The light pink ones are definitely grapefruit and taste horrible. I wanted to love these, but I don't.

product_title: Puroast Low Acid Coffee Organic Dark French Roast, Drip Grind, 2.5-Pound Bag
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body:
I've ordered this brand several times & always liked it. This particular bag me feel sick to my stomach, and very jittery, even when I mixed it 50/50 with Puroast decaf. I'm not sure where this is sourced, but it feels like low-quality coffee--a very nasty caffeine buzz.
Amazon processed a refund. Until I see where they're sourcing, I won't buy this coffee again.

product_title: Hinterland Trading Air Plant Xerographica Huge !! King of Air Plants Beautiful Bromelaid Stunning Houseplant
review_headline: these plants require far less water than recommended. The plant rotted
review_body: The care instructions did not work, these plants require far less water than recommended. The plant rotted, turned black, and fell apart.

product_title: Equal Exchange Organic Hot Cocoa Mix, 12-Ounce Tins (Pack of 3)
review_headline: It made me sick
review_body: Seriously this stuff did NOT taste good. Plus my stomach was not happy after I forced down at cup!  Three canisters of it and now I have to toss them-

product_title: Dukan Diet Oat Bran Cookies, Chocolate Chip , 9.6 Ounce
review_headline: Contains sucralose an ingredient that makes a lot of people sick
review_body:
These contain sucralose a dangerous ingredient that makes a lot of people sick, including me.
They also contain wheat gluten so are not good for someone with a gluten sensitivity.

product_title: Trader Joe's Crystallized Candied Ginger, 8 Oz Bag (Pack of 2)
review_headline: Possibly has Lead.. Maybe Trader Joe's will fix it soon?? Try Ginger People brand.. Helps nausea/sick tummy/digestion..
review_body: I love Trader Joe's!! They sell some unique and creative Natural type products. But, several other reviews here for the other size product said this product may contain lead. Try the Ginger People brand of natural ginger candy. I am buying the 6 pack. This brand is sold at the fancier checkouts in stores like Brennan's or Marshall's/TJ Maxx,  in the cute box with a Ginger Person character on it that looks like the root. Ginger is good for nausea or upset stomach.

product_title: Japanese Rice Cake Mochi Daifuku (Assorted)15.8 oz
review_headline: I get sick after eating that. WTF!? I ate three of them and felt stomach.
review_body: I am not very sure whether it was the cause. But I can say that it was chemically nasty. Believe me

product_title: Multi-Cat Formula Clumping Cat Litter (25 lbs)
review_headline: Scoop Away made us all sick--humans and pets
review_body:
Our cat does not normally have a litter box- she is an indoor and outdoor pet. However, I was going on a 2 week vacation
and our daughter kept her at college. This required a litter box so we purchased scoop away. The cat got very ill, one eye
is swollen shut, she walks funny and is not the same. She is old but was not in this condition before. Our daughter got a
a swollen mouth and was itching and was put on steroids. Keep in mind she has been around our cat her whole life.
I returned home. The cat was ill, so we kept the litter box in our master bath. I held our sick cat after being away for about
two weeks. I woke up in the middle of the night with my lips very swollen and having difficulty breathing. Last night I had
hives on my arms after cleaning the box and began to wonder. I called my daughter at college and after discussing this issue
we agree it is the litter. The box says it manufactured under Clorox pet products....probably has bleach in it, which is toxic.

product_title: Gluten Free All Purpose Baking Flour
review_headline: We all got sick
review_body: Buyer beware. The beans in this flour are NOT soaked first so if you find beans challenging to digest do not buy this. We did not know this and are hours into stomach pain, gas and not happy. We called the company and they told us they don't soak the beans. Normally we digest well but all our beans are soaked overnight and drained and then cooked again

product_title: Eve's Red Maple Bonsai Seed Kit, Woody, Complete Kit to Grow Red Maple Bonsai from Seed
review_headline: seeds rotten
review_body: every seed i tried to start ended up with white fuzzy mold on it. i tried several different methods of germination and nothing worked. not even the suggested way. bought one for me and one for my father who is on the other side of the country so we could have something common growing at the same time. very dissapointed, we both experienced the same thing. waste of time and money

product_title: Stella Di Natale Zaghis Italian Holiday Cake Star
review_headline: avoid this dry cake......even if free postage is offered
review_body:
i am disappointed! I sent this to my family.who love this type of cake.....they advised that it was dry and terrible........and not to waste my money on
it again........steer clear of this brand even if free postage is offered. I have not had a problem with other brands!

product_title: Corn Pops Cereal, 12.5-Ounce Packages (Pack of 4)
review_headline: Please avoid GMo - Kellog!
review_body: Corn is one of the most common genetically modified crop in USA. Unless it is organic, it has GMO. Corn pop has GMO and is extremely harmful to humans and children. I avoid it! Kellog, please don't use GMO for our kids.

product_title: Set of Fresh Kaffir Lime Leaves, Lemon Grass, Galangal, Thai Chili
review_headline: rotten!
review_body: I assumed they had some magic way of packaging that these would arrive as pictured.  Well, I guess not.  They were just all thrown together in 1 bag for the MANY day trip.  What I received was a bag of rotten produce.

product_title: Bridgford Pepperoni
review_headline: Smelled rotten
review_body: I purchased this product (pack of 3). I cut all 3 open and they smelled rotten. Amazon was amazing and sent a replacement order. However, the 3 new sticks also smelled rotten. I have been purchasing pepperoni my entire adult life, but have never experienced such a bad smell before. I have no idea if this brand is always like this but I do know I will not buy Bridgford again.

product_title: The Raw Food World  Organic Maca Powder, 1 Pound
review_headline: Made me violently ill!
review_body: I have used Maca in the past for perimenopause symptoms, which worked very well.  These were capsules, and were not made with raw maca.  I eat raw food, so I thought Raw Maca would be a healthier choice.  After consuming a very small amount of this organic raw maca powder in a smoothie I became violently ill.  It was obvious my body wanted nothing to do with this product.  After further research I found that the Peruvian people would never eat Maca in it's raw form.  After doing some more research, I found that raw maca powder can cause digestive issues if the starches are not gelatinized. Basically the powder needs to be cooked at around 300*F to break down the enzymes. It can also be contaminate with bacteria.  This is not something to mess around with, I literally felt like I had the flu.  I was vomiting for 24 hours, had the worse headache of my life, and every joint in my body ached.

product_title: Hinterland Trading Air Plant Tillandsia Combo Pack! 2 Ionantha Guatemalan and Argentea Makes a Great Little Houseplant or Gift!
review_headline: one came sick looking
review_body: one of the plants came a little black and sick it lasted a few months but the finally died i guess i should have asked for a replacement when it came but i thought it might just be in delivery shock

product_title: New Hope Mills Sugar Free Pancake & Waffle Mix (9 Ounces)
review_headline: icky
review_body:
lousy taste and texture

(the only product I have found that makes acceptable low-carb goods is Carb-quik)

would not buy again

product_title: Betty Crocker Cotton Candy Cookie Mix 17.5 Oz
review_headline: avoid
review_body: I wouldn't buy these. They aren't inedible but the burnt sugar-like sweetness is not a good flavor profile...and they are so overwhelming sweet. I ate a couple and tossed the rest of the batch.

product_title: Sparkling ICE Spring Water, 17 Ounce (Pack of 12)
review_headline: Terrible bottle design, dangerous red leaks!
review_body: I like the taste of this beverage but the bottle is made of a flimsy plastic and the cap is not well-designed, so the liquid (since it is carbonated) is constantly bubbling up into the cap and getting all over the place. I wouldn't care so much except the liquid is bright red! Even if the liquid hasn't been disturbed for a few days, because the drinks were jostled so much during shipping, they still, five days later, are erupting slightly when I open them and have been consistently causing me problems. Just wanted to warn future customers that this is not Vitamin Water or Propel with their high-quality, thick plastic bottles.

product_title: Anamu Tea (Jamaican Guinea Hen Weed 100%) Roots and Leaves by SipaCupa
review_headline: Really stinky stuff
review_body: I am sure it has wonderful healing properties, but the smell is rough and it makes your breath smell for awhile.

product_title: Hansen's Natural Energy, Original, 8.3 Ounce Cans (Pack of 12)
review_headline: I did not like product. made me sick
review_body: I did not like product. made me sick. I have tried other energy products and this one was not to good. I had to throw away the other cans.

product_title: Indian Pumpkin Seeds - 5/16 oz (single)
review_headline: Made me ill!
review_body: I used to love these as a kid.  I've ordered them online before and been really happy with them in the past.  However, this time... every time I eat a pack of them they make me violently ill a few hours afterwards.  Seeing as I used to eat packs of these at a time... and I eat other pumpkin seeds no problem... I think it may have been a bad batch.  I'm too scared to ever order them again.

product_title: Healthworks Cacao Powder Parent
review_headline: Horrible and made me sick
review_body:
I switched to this product because it's organic and raw whereas the cacoa powder I'd been using
was just organic. At first, I just didn't like the flavor. then, i developed a migraine and muscle spasms
in my body. I didn't want to jump to any conclusions about the product, so I tried it at least 4 or 5 other
days. Same response. In my opinion, there is something wrong with this product. It should be sent for testing.

product_title: MIO Green Thunder, 1.62-Ounce (Pack of 4)
review_headline: icky
review_body: I hate drinking plain water and have tried a lot of flavorings and this is towards the bottom. It is like a moldy green apple. As for the 'energy', I felt no difference, unlike when I drink Advocare Spark or [[ASIN:B007LK5DDG Crystal Light On The Go Energy Citrus, 10 Packets (Pack of 4)]]. I'm glad I got to try it for free with a coupon from MyCokeRewards.

product_title: Bearitos Corn Taco Shells
review_headline: Got sick eating them...
review_body:
...and I do not get sick often - if at all!
I am not sure how old they were, but there was no expiration date on the box.

They smelled a bit wierd coming out of the oven.
Had a bitter aftertaste.
Awful!

These had the following 2 or 3 ingredients:
organic stoneground blue corn masa,
expeller pressed high oleic safflower and/or sunflower oil.
Went to tell them on their website.....no website!
BEWARE!

product_title: unif bowl instant noodles - artificial beef with sauerkrant flavor (pack of 12)
review_headline: full of chemicals, felt sick
review_body:
I would advise not to buy this brand of instant noodles. Full of chemicals and I felt sick after eating it.

There are lots of ads on TV about this new flavor and I thought I could have a try, thinking the smell, taste and overall quality could be improved. Yet, I was disappointed.

I would recommend if you have to have some instant food, Nissin instant noodles, made in Hong Kong, guessing the quality control will be better. But any way, I am only taking instant noodle when I am really hungry and there is nothing around to eat.

product_title: GimMe Health Foods Organic Roasted Seaweed Snacks
review_headline: Warning!  This tatses like a rotten fish!
review_body: Trying to make healthy choices, but this stuff is just AWFUL!  BARF!!  It smells like a really dirty fish tank and I don't think it tastes much better!

product_title: Zevia All Natural Soda, Cola, 12 Ounce (Pack of 24)
review_headline: Made us feel sick.
review_body:
It made two completely healthy people with notably different digestion systems feel sick. One got a headache for two days, the other felt a full body tingle for several hours.

Also, it's flat (insufficient carbonation), and, really, it's not so very natural at all.

In sum, I would suggest burning it with fire, but the fumes might harm you.

product_title: Tazo Filter Bag Tea for Keurig Brewers - Zen
review_headline: Makes me feel sick
review_body: Every time I drink this tea it makes me feel nauseous. Why? I have no idea, but no other tea I have ever consumed has done so. So, 1 star.

product_title: Fra Mani Salametto Piccante Spicy Dry Chorizo - 10 Ounce Average
review_headline: Arrived one day before Xmas, which was perfect.... but it arrived rotten, which was pretty awful...
review_body: Pretty sure once these are exposed to too much moisture, they rot.  Alas.  Had to toss it and have a slightly less Spanish celebration.

product_title: Amazing Box of 100 Elite Kosher Bazooka Bubble Gums with Comics in Hebrew Certified " Parve Kosher" by OU & "Delicious" by Millions Ages 3-100
review_headline: rotten
review_body:
The taste was not good and not similar to the bazooka you buy in israel and they were really hard to chew.
moreover they gave me stomach trouble.
I guess they were rotten and old.

product_title: Bolthouse Farms DAILY GREENS "Kale, Spinach, Romaine" 15.2 oz (12 Count)
review_headline: no stars....this will make you sick
review_body: I . Twenty minutes after drinking this beverage, I tried to pull over on the side of the road to puke, but I didn't make it and the juice contents ended up all over my car. This beverage will make you sick. I am a salad and vegetable lover so  I thought I would like this. Save yourself four dollars and pick something else.

product_title: Go Raw Freeland Flax Snax, Spicy Flax Snax, 3.0-Ounce Bags (Pack of 6)
review_headline: Not spicy, also made me ill
review_body:
These crackers are tasty, with the main flavor coming through being garlic. I would rename these "savory crackers" and I see some other reviewers agree, it's just not "spicy", it has no kick to it.

I've found their sunflower and pizza spiced crackers to be amazing and their "simple seed" sprouted pumpkin and sunflower seeds are easier to digest than unsprouted seeds and are a great addition to cereal. I fully support Go RAW but I think this particular flavor needs revamping.

On a side note, I don't know if I got a hold of a bad batch, but after eating these crackers I felt queasy and 1 hour later vomited. After vomiting I felt so much better. I know that flax seeds can easily go rancid, and since this was the only time I've ever eaten this flavor I wasn't sure how they normally smell.

product_title: Bluefin Tuna Tarantello in Olive Oil Tre Torri – Sicily
review_headline: Makes me sick
review_body: Extinction chances are off the chart high for this species of tuna.  Don't be part of it. Please look it up for yourself

product_title: Wat-Aah Pure Spring Water, 16.9 Ounce (Pack of 12)
review_headline: Terrible and made me sick!
review_body: This water is TERRIBLE!  I opened the bottle and it smelled like chlorine/bleach and tastes like plastic.  I drank about 1/4 of the bottle and feel sick to my stomach.  Tried calling the company and got a "we'll have someone call you back".  I read another review online from awhile back where the same thing was said by another person - it smelled like chlorine or plastic and tasted like plastic and she felt sick after drinking it.  DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT!

product_title: Suja Juice Fresh Start Program
review_headline: Made me ill
review_body:
Alright, I admit it - I gave into this juicing trend and tried the Suja Cleanse. A few of the people I work with had been saying how wonderful a juice cleanse was and they do them periodically. So I purchased my boxes at a neighborhood health food start and started on January 6th after quitting caffeine and alcohol 2 days prior. I'm basically a one cup of coffee/one glass of wine type person anyways so I didn't think I would have too much of a problem.

Started the cleanse. Juices tasted okay, but I make a green drink with kale, spinach etc anyways, so I'm used to the taste. Was hungry but just kept busy. I was cold all day as a couple of other reviewers wrote and felt weaker, which I wasn't expecting until the 2nd day. Around 4 pm the headache and diarrhea started, followed by the vomiting. Both of which did not end until around 9:30 pm. Maybe I have so many toxins in my body that this detox is particularly hard, but I can't finish the cleanse. I did not eat anything, because I want at least one fully day of cleansing and was having trouble even keeping sips of water down. I have 3 bottles of juice still left from the one day that I wasn't able to drink.

Be warned. This cleanse, to my body, feels like giving myself a stomach bug. You may want to start with just one day and see how you feel. If your body can tolerate a cleanse such as this, the Suja brand is probably fine. I did end up losing 5 lb, but most of that will come back. I also lost most of my afternoon and evening yesterday due to extreme nausea. I don't think everyone can tolerate a cleanse like this. I certainly couldn't. Think I'll stick to my green smoothies in the morning and eat very few processed foods.

product_title: Diet Nectar De Guanabana
review_headline: Made me sick
review_body: The regular Goya soursop juice is delicious, but has too many carbs for me, so when I saw how low the carbs were in this diet soursop, I thought I'd give it a try. (I found it at my local grocery store.) Within a few minutes of drinking it, I felt very strange and very nauseated, and then vomited. I looked up the ingredient "neotame," and found out that it is a new artificial sweetener from Monsanto that is thought to be more toxic than aspartame. I recommend avoiding anything this diet juice and anything else with neotame!!!

product_title: Jamaican Fruit Cake Mix - Annilu 1.7 Lb - Product of Jamaican
review_headline: Makes you sick. !!!!!
review_body:
This cake mix cost 15 dollars plus shipping, there were hard chunks in the cake, and my entire fire, got
stomach issues and spent 1 entire day in the restroom. I wound up throwing 3/4 of the cake
in the garbage. I DO NOT RECCOMEND this cake to anyone.

product_title: ALO - Coco Exposed Pure Coconut Water + Real Aloe Vera Wheatgrass - 11.8 oz.
review_headline: Not what it appears to be  (Unreliable Seller) avoid the Lucky Vitamin
review_body:
